meanings.definition: Behavers (noun): individuals who behave in a certain way
meanings.sent1: The behavers in the classroom always follow the rules.
meanings.sent2: The behavers at the party were polite and friendly.
meanings.sent3: The behavers in the zoo made the animals feel comfortable.
meanings.sent4: The behavers of the team set a good example for others.
meanings.sent5: The behavers in the library were quiet and respectful.

meanings.definition: Behavers (verb): third person plural form of behave
meanings.sent1: During the play, the characters behavers were realistic.
meanings.sent2: The students behavers in class were exemplary.
meanings.sent3: The dogs behavers in the park were quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The waves behavers as they crashed against the shore.
meanings.sent5: The cars behavers smoothly on the newly paved road.
